subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: In two races at Taladega last year, Jimmie Johnson was blamed for three accidents that wrecked 39 cars.  This year in the Aaron's 499 he ran a cautious race and drafted to victory.
snippet: In two races at Taladega last year, Jimmie Johnson was blamed for three accidents that wrecked 39 cars.  This year in the Aaron's 499 he ran a cautious race and drafted to victory.
